=== I'm getting a "missing msvcr71.dll" warning on Hawkscope startup ===
msvcr71.dll is Microsoft Visual C Runtime 7.1 Dynamic Link Library. One way to remove this warning is to You can [http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvcr71 download msvcr71.dll] and drop it to your C:\Windows\System32 folder.
